page.title: 06Employment 2
page.content:
Most of our parents are working in Caring Jobs.These include nurses and care assistants in hospitals, Social Services' attendants, home helpers, and a school transport attendant for a special school. We live close to the General Hospital and also to the Giant Mental Hospital at Winwick which is one of the biggest employers in the area.
Some of our parents are in service jobs like car repairing,lorry mending, serving in shops,clerking and driving. No body did an actual manufacturing job but one is a packaging worker and the lorry driver works for a brewery. Only two parents are self employed. One fits double glazing and the other is a taxi driver.
